title._content: Image taken from page 176 of 'Le Forez pendant la Révolution. Collection de documents rares ou inédits relatifs à cette province de 1789 à 1800, recueillis, publiés et annotés par P. Donot et le vicomte L. de Neufbourg'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Le Forez pendant la Révolution. Collection de documents rares ou inédits relatifs à cette province de 1789 à 1800, recueillis, publiés et annotés par P. Donot et le vicomte L. de Neufbourg" Author: DONOT, P. Contributor: NEUFBOURG, L. de - Viscount Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9226.m.9." Page: 176 Place of Publishing: Lyon Date of Publishing: 1888 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000967010 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
